metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41639 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A heap based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in tile decoding code ofTIFF image parser in OpenImageIO master-branch-9aeece7a and v2.3.19.0. Aspecially-crafted TIFF file can lead to an out of bounds memory corruption,which can result in arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
